Package io.micronaut.security.oauth2.url

Classes related to the generation of URLs to be used as routes in the application.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HostResolver
    Resolves the host name of the current server.
    OauthRouteUrlBuilder
    Responsible for building URLs to routes the client will receive requests on.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultHostResolver
    Default implementation of HostResolver.
    DefaultOauthRouteUrlBuilder
    Default implementation of OauthRouteUrlBuilder

Package io.micronaut.security.oauth2.url Description

Classes related to the generation of URLs to be used as routes in the application.
Since:
1.2.0
Author:
James Kleeh
